title: Going Straight (1916 Classic, Silent, Film Noir (tinted), Drama)

sources.title: Going Straight (1916 Classic, Silent, Film Noir (tinted), Drama)
sources.description: TAGLINE : Have we killed him? PLOT : A man and his wife both have criminal pasts, but have quit crime and are now respectable citizens. One day a member of their old gang shows up and threatens to expose them if they don't help him pull a heist. _IMDb by frankfob2 ** The non-profit streaming of the commercial free, quality films I have very much enjoyed and therefore uploaded to archive.org , are for educational purposes. I have uploaded each movie for posterity , with the hope that all present and future generations will learn from and enjoy them, as much as I have. I own zero rights to this film, nor to any other I have uploaded, and I receive nothing for the uploads nor for the information I put with those uploads. Although I do receive great joy from sharing these uploads with you, I have no wish to infringe on any existing copyright laws . DEF gp ddh ** (Thank you once again, mjr1114 !! )
